content: प्रकॢप् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To be fit or suitable for. {@--2@} To happen, occur. {@--3@} To be successful. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To invent, devise, plan (schemes &c.). {@--2@} To prepare, make ready, equip, accoutre. {@--3@} To treat with respect. {@--4@} To fix, settle. {@--5@} To appoint, invest, install. {@--6@} To fix, fasten, bind. {@--7@} To further, advance, promote.
